message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product, considering its value to me is worth no more than $10,000. I believe this is a fair price considering your original offer of $9,500.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,500 is too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
I understand your position, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to pay $8,750 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I place on it.
